column4: hi, i have just installed ubuntu onto my computer, just trying to figure out how to install video card drivers, i have downloaded the 64bit linux nvidia 304.37 drivers for it, as a .run file, but when i open it(in gedit?) it says The file you opened has some invalid characters.
generally bin files are not meant to be viewed.  and generally after installing a driver, you have to reboot -- did you reboot?
the only time you need to reboot in Linux is after a driver install, or you can't get to consold (ctrl+alt+f1)  -- unlike windows, there is no such thing as a theraputic reboot
